channel.title: Comments on: So sad to say, I must be on me way
channel.description: Won't you join me for a crazy crazy China adventure?

item.title: by: amy bugg
item.description: Gee whiz Will Sanders! I'll miss your updates and emails, but I'll expect a really long one when you get back. I hope that you are having the most exciting, adventurous, and awesome birthday ever!! I love you!
item.content:encoded: Gee whiz Will Sanders! I’ll miss your updates and emails, but I’ll expect a really long one when you get back. I hope that you are having the most exciting, adventurous, and awesome birthday ever!! I love you!

item.title: by: Matt O.
item.description:
Happy Birthday Will. Glad you made it out of the country before you turned 30. Hopefully I'll be as lucky.
Make sure to summarize all in a beefy post when you get back, I look forward to hearing it.
item.content:encoded:
Happy Birthday Will. Glad you made it out of the country before you turned 30. Hopefully I’ll be as lucky.

Make sure to summarize all in a beefy post when you get back, I look forward to hearing it.

item.title: by: Marcus
item.description: Happy Birthday Mr. Sanders, Have fun! Stay Green
item.content:encoded:
Happy Birthday Mr. Sanders,
Have fun!
Stay Green
